comments.author: cww@mozilla.com
comments.creator: cww@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Some malware/pages (need more investigation) are causing Firefox to show a red info bar to get users to install an update (update.exe or sometimes an xpi)

Here are some SUMO reports:

https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/832076
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/827486

This also came up two months or so ago.

https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/800438 (users are digging up this one from a while ago recently)
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/797547
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/797369

In some of the old ones, users were blaming Game Play Labs extension for causing the dropdown error.
comments.raw_text:
Some malware/pages (need more investigation) are causing Firefox to show a red info bar to get users to install an update (update.exe or sometimes an xpi)

Here are some SUMO reports:

https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/832076
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/827486

This also came up two months or so ago.

https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/800438 (users are digging up this one from a while ago recently)
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/797547
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/questions/797369

In some of the old ones, users were blaming Game Play Labs extension for causing the dropdown error.
